node.name: gted (GetText EDitor and Tools Integration)
node.shortdescription: gted (GetText EDitor) is an editor for gettext po files and an Eclipse integration of gettext tools. gted is developed as Eclipse plugin and therefore very usefull for developers (and translators) using the Eclipse IDE for developement.
node.body: gted (GetText EDitor) is an editor for gettext po files and an Eclipse integration of gettext tools. gted is developed as Eclipse plugin and therefore very usefull for developers (and translators) using the Eclipse IDE for developement.
